properties.description: Posted by Chippynot on the map :( but you can see it on "satellite" I shall be there soon

properties.name: Found an uncommon US penny here
properties.description: Posted by ChippyAll the time I was in Sussex, I didnt find a single coin, let alone, a penny - as I was leaving to board the train, I found a US Penny. heh. no pics though... Cant say if it was a lucky day, as the trains were cancelled due to flooding on the line! Then I had a 5 hour train journey.

properties.name: Lucky Penny
properties.description: Posted by ChippyFound outside the Somerfield Supermarket. Just as i found it, friend popped along, so he took a picture of me picking it up!

properties.name: Lucky Penny
properties.description: Posted by ChippyFound outside the bus stop, was too amazed to find it, plus, shy to ask the people waiting for a bus to take my photo with it. Very shiny new penny!

properties.name: in the air somewhere between LHR and Shannon
properties.description: Posted by Chippyin the air somewhere between heathrow and shannonI was on a plane from Heathrow to Shannon in Ireland at the time. When we touched down in Shannon it was very quiet everywhere (its a small airport anyhow!) but i thought it especially quiet. Didnt hear about the tragic news until i got into my hire car and turned on the radio. thought it was an orson wells type radio-play (irish radio is quite cultured, plays are common) until the full case of the event was revealed.
